# Vuetify Project Setup Instructions

## Project Type
- Framework: Vue 3 with Vuetify 3
- Language: TypeScript
- Build Tool: Vite

## Progress Checklist
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold the project structure
- [x] Create source files and components
- [x] Install dependencies
- [x] Create and run dev task
- [x] Create documentation

## Development

Run `npm run dev` to start the development server at http://localhost:5173/
